# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-

# Read input
a, b, c = map(int, input().split())

# Calculate number of times we can hear the sound
num_times = b // a

# Cap the number of times we can hear the sound
if num_times > c:
    num_times = c

# Print number of times
print(num_times)

a, b, c = map(int, input().split())

n = b // a

print(min(n, c))

#--- get input ---#
a, b, c = map(int, input().split())

#--- output ---#
print(min(b // a, c))


# --- other method ---
# print(min(b // a, c))

# Get user input
a, b, c = map(int, input().split())

# Calculate the number of times to hear the sound
sounds = b // a

# If the number of times to hear the sound is greater than the maximum number of times, set the number of times to hear the sound to the maximum number of times
if sounds > c:
    sounds = c

# Print the number of times to hear the sound
print(sounds)
